summary:
Marvel Comics, now owned by Disney, started in 1939 as Timely Comics. It became famous in the 1960s with superheroes like Spider-Man, Iron Man, and the Avengers. These heroes, along with popular villains like Doctor Doom and Thanos, live in the Marvel Universe, often set in real-world locations. Marvel also publishes comics based on other franchises, like *Star Wars*.

With a rich history and iconic characters, Marvel has become a giant in the comic book world, inspiring movies, TV shows, and a huge fan base.
title: Marvel Comics
